tool_description: Find relevant color for montana spray.
title: bf-spray

api_list.name: All Colors
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bf-spray.p.rapidapi.com/colors"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bf-spray.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search relevant colors
api_list.description: Search from list a montana sprays and get relevant find colors. Set specific color name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bf-spray.p.rapidapi.com/color/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bf-spray.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
